channel.title: R on Kevin Zolea
channel.description: Recent content in R on Kevin Zolea

item.title: Tracking Covid19 Cases Throughout NJ with R
item.description: Creating an animated time series map showing the spread of covid19 throughout NJ using the R programming language.

item.title: Making a plot of December snowfall data in NJ with R's ggplot2 & rnoaa
item.description: Using the rnoaa package to get weather data into R and plot with ggplot2

item.title: Quick Tips For Customizing Your R Leaflet Map
item.description: Useful tips for adding some flavor to your interactive leaflet map using the R leaflet package

item.title: Using the USGS dataRetrieval package to analyze continuous water quality data
item.description: Introduction on using the USGS dataRetrieval package to create a graph in ggplot2 to visualize total dissolved solid

item.title: Creating a website with the academic theme in blogdown
item.description: My thoughts and some guidance on how to set up a free website with blogdown, GitHub, and Netlify
